@jeanm  Missed this. Please revert this line- this says, "everyone ought to translate the term Ligurian".  Please don't mandate that yet.

nodes.bodyText: If there is grammar info, check it, even if it's in seed. (there's no seed/supplemental/* )

Thought i fixed this before. Basically, this makes sure we get some details about what locales were missing, not just 'assert failed'.
The issue here was that this PR had incorrectly added lij to language80 coverage rules. That's no longer in this PR, but this makes sure that the resulting err is clear.
we still assert, but print the warning first before bailing out
